Music is influenced by music. Until science and technology advances so much that new sounds, instruments, chords, and styles can be created, every single song you hear is gonna sound like something else. If you don't like one sound, it doesn't make others bad, cliche, or unoriginal, especially because music is also influenced by experience and emotion, and can be incredibly important to someone. Btw, making other people feel bad because it makes you feel better about yourself makes you a shitty person.
